p:
The bioassays for the average emergence were conducted using the same experimental procedures described for the instantaneous rate of increase ( r
i ). The progeny formed by the adult C. maculatus emerging from the beans were assessed in two days intervals starting from the 20 th day after treatments began until no adult emergence was observed (i.e., 20 days after emergence of the 1 st adults). After each assessment, the emerged adults were removed.
